vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πρίσκιλλα, see: Πρίσκα.
Πρίσκα, -ας, ἡ (Lat.), and Πρίσκιλλα, -ης, ἡ, Prisca: Rom_16:3, 1Co_16:19, 2Ti_4:19; Priscilla: Act_18:2; Act_18:18; Act_18:26; the wife of Aquila, vs. Ἀκύλας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.18.2; married to Aquila (G0207); also called Prisca at Rom.16.3; 2x
§ Priscilla, Prisca (Proper name), the diminutive form of Πρισκα, the wife of Aquila, Acts 18:2, 18, 26*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
百基拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "遠古"
一個基督徒婦女，是亞居拉之妻 (徒 18:2,18,26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
百基拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "远古"
一个基督徒妇女，是亚居拉之妻 (徒 18:2,18,26)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bê-rít-sin; Pơ-rít-xi-la là vợ của A-qui-la, « bà già nhỏ » Xem G4251
